title: Where the Salt Lurks on Restaurant Menus
author: Alina Dizik
description: Jeremy Bearman of Rouge Tomate shares some of his secrets for preparing a lower-sodium entrée.
cleaned_text: Updated Jan. 9, 2013 12:01 am ET Starting with the bread and salad and ending with the final plate of tiny cookies, many of restaurants' least salty-seeming options are significant sources of dietary salt.
